titleStmt.title: A true bill of the vvhole number that hath died in the cittie of London, the citty of VVestminster, the citty of Norwich, and diuers other places, since the time this last sicknes of the plague began in either of them, to this present month of October the 20. day, 1603. With a relation of many visitations by the plague, in sundry other forraine countries.
Bills of mortality. 1603
titleStmt.author: Worshipful Company of Parish Clerks.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I.R[oberts]. for Iohn Trundle, and are to be sold at his shop in Barbican, neere Long lane end,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and date of publication from STC.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: his shop in Barbican, neere Long lane end
